workflow.title: System Workflow
workflow.instructions: Click on any step to learn more about how the system processes your requests

userInput.title: User Input
userInput.detail: Users enter natural language questions about their business data. The system accepts queries in multiple languages and can understand complex business intelligence requests such as sales analysis, performance metrics, and data comparisons.

azureOpenAI.title: Azure OpenAI
azureOpenAI.detail: Azure OpenAI processes the natural language input using advanced language models. It understands the user's intent, identifies key business metrics, and determines what type of data analysis is needed to provide accurate insights.

parameterExtraction.title: Parameter Extraction
parameterExtraction.detail: The AI extracts specific parameters from the user query such as date ranges, product categories, regions, or performance metrics. These parameters are structured to enable precise data retrieval from the connected systems.

mcpServer.title: MCP Server
mcpServer.detail: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) server connects to various data sources including databases, APIs, and business systems. It retrieves the requested data using the extracted parameters and applies necessary filtering and aggregations.

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.detail: Raw data is processed, analyzed, and transformed into meaningful business insights. This includes calculations, statistical analysis, trend identification, and preparation for visualization or export.

visualization.title: Visualization
visualization.detail: Processed data is presented through interactive charts, tables, and visualizations. Users can export data to Excel with professional formatting or view real-time charts for immediate insights and decision-making.
